title: Sinner returns from doping ban at Italian Open
description: Jannik Sinner is returning from a doping ban at the Italian Open.

title: 'I have some gas left in the tank': At 37, Djokovic still has big tennis goals
description: Djokovic has had a rough start to 2025, but shown flashes of brilliance too. And he's aiming for that 100th tour win.
author: Simon Cambers

title: Unlock the Perfect Slice Serve - Essential Tennis Podcast #415
description: The wide slice serve is a CRITICAL tool to have in your tool box. It pulls opponents out of position, opens the court up for you to hit into, exposes their usually weaker backhand side, and forces them to run twice as far for the next shot - if they even get it at all. Let’s take a deep dive into how YOU can develop this powerful weapon, step by step in this special episode of the Essential Tennis Podcast.
author: Essential Tennis LLC

title: 3 Djokovic Secrets To Winning More Matches - Essential Tennis Podcast #414
description: In this special episode of the Essential Tennis Podcast, you're going to learn the top 3 tactical secrets of Novak Djokovic that you can apply in your very next match. Use these tools to gain precision, consistency, and offense to make your opponents more uncomfortable, win more points, and win more matches.
author: Essential Tennis LLC

title: Britain's Raducanu handed wildcard in Strasbourg
description: British number two Emma Raducanu will play one final tournament before the French Open after being handed a wildcard in Strasbourg.

title: Paolini fights back to reach Italian Open semis
description: Home favourite Jasmine Paolini recovers from a set down and a 4-0 deficit in the second set to edge past Diana Shnaider and reach the Italian Open semi-finals.

title: What were the Rome tennis results?
description: The 2025 Internazionali BNL d'Italia continued on Tuesday, a day that featured tantalising matches as well as an extended rain delay. Among the winners were top seed Jannik Sinner, second seed Alexander Zverev and third seed Carlos Alcaraz. View all the Rome tennis results from Tuesday below. Results - Tuesday, 13 May 2025 Men's Singles - Round of 16 ATP - [3] Carlos Alcaraz (ESP) d [23] Karen Khachanov 63 36 75 ATP - [1] Jannik Sinner (ITA) d [17] Francisco Cerundolo (ARG) 76(2) 63 ATP - [8] Lorenzo Musetti (ITA) d [10] Daniil Medvedev 75 64 ATP - [2] Alexander Zverev (GER) d [13] Arthur Fils (FRA) 76(3) 61 ATP - [11] Tommy Paul (USA) d [7] Alex de Minaur (AUS) 75 63 ATP - [5] Jack Draper (GBR) d Corentin Moutet (FRA) 16 64 63 ATP - [30] Hubert Hurkacz (POL) d [20] Jakub Mensik (CZE) 76(5) 46 76(5) Men's Doubles - Round of 16 ATP - [4] Marcel Granollers (ESP)/Horacio Zeballos (ARG) d [Alt] Sander Arends (NED)/Luke Johnson (GBR) 64 36 10-4 ATP - [3] Kevin Krawietz (GER)/Tim Puetz (GER) d Matthew Ebden (AUS)/John Peers (AUS) 26 76(2) 12-10 ATP - [2] Harri Heliovaara (FIN)/Henry Patten (GBR) d Lorenzo Musetti (ITA)/Lorenzo Sonego (ITA) Walkover ATP - Joe Salisbury (GBR)/Neal Skupski (GBR) d Rohan Bopanna (IND)/Adam Pavlasek (CZE) 63 63 Women's Singles WTA - [6] Jasmine Paolini (ITA) d [13] Diana Shnaider 67(1) 64 62   Women's Doubles WTA - [6] Mirra  Andreeva/Diana Shnaider d Hao-Ching Chan (TPE)/Giuliana Olmos (MEX) 64 62 WTA - Alexandra Eala (PHI)/Coco Gauff (USA) d Tyra Caterina Grant (ITA)/Lisa Pigato (ITA) 62 63   [NEWSLETTER FORM]

title: What is the Rome tennis schedule?
description: Two quarter-finals at the Internazionali BNL d’Italia will take place on Wednesday in Rome. Carlos Alcaraz takes a 3-2 Lexus ATP Head2Head lead into his clash with Jack Draper on Campo Centrale not before 3 p.m. CEST/9 a.m. EDT. Defending champion and No. 2 in the PIF ATP Rankings, Alexander Zverev faces Italian Lorenzo Musetti in the last scheduled match on Campo Centrale. Casper Ruud’s fourth-round clash with Jaume Munar was postponed due to Tuesday’s rain delay, and will open Grand Stand Arena at 2 p.m. View Wednesday’s full order of play below. ORDER OF PLAY - WEDNESDAY, 14 MAY 2025 Campo Centrale - start 13:00 WTA - [4] Coco Gauff (USA) vs [7] Mirra Andreeva Not Before 15:00 ATP - [5] Jack Draper (GBR) vs [3] Carlos Alcaraz (ESP) Not Before 19:00 WTA - [1] Aryna Sabalenka vs [8] Qinwen Zheng (CHN) Not Before 20:30 ATP - [8] Lorenzo Musetti (ITA) vs [2] Alexander Zverev (GER) Grand Stand Arena - start 14:00 ATP - Jaume Munar (ESP) vs [6] Casper Ruud (NOR) Followed By WTA - After suitable rest - [3] Sara Errani (ITA) / Jasmine Paolini (ITA) vs Alexandra Eala (PHI) / Coco Gauff (USA) ATP - [WC] Federico Bondioli (ITA) / Carlo Alberto Caniato (ITA) vs Sadio Doumbia (FRA) / Fabien Reboul (FRA) SuperTennis Arena - start 13:00 ATP - Andre Goransson (SWE) / Sem Verbeek (NED) vs [7] Christian Harrison (USA) / Evan King (USA) ATP - [1] Marcelo Arevalo (ESA) / Mate Pavic (CRO) vs Sander Gille (BEL) / Jan Zielinski (POL) Pietrangeli - start 13:00 ATP - Matteo Arnaldi (ITA) / Alexei Popyrin (AUS) vs [Alt] Guido Andreozzi (ARG) / Theo Arribage (FRA) Followed By WTA - After suitable rest - [1] Gabriela Dabrowski (CAN) / Erin Routliffe (NZL) vs [6] Mirra Andreeva / Diana Shnaider [NEWSLETTER FORM]

title: Italian Open 2025 Day 7 Recap
description: On day 7 of the Internazionali BNL d’Italia in Rome, all sixteen men were scheduled to be in action in their fourth-round clashes at the Foro Italico. However, only seven of the eight matches were completed. Earlier rain delays forced the postponement of Casper Ruud’s round-of-16 clash with Jaume Munar to Wednesday, as the match …
author: Jonathan

title: Italian Open 2025 Day 6 Recap
description: Day 6 of the Internazionali BNL d’Italia delivered a mix of dominant performances and an unfortunate injury as the Round of 32 concluded in Rome. Top seed Jannik Sinner continued his seamless return to the ATP Tour, while rising star Jakub Mensik solidified his credentials at the Masters 1000 level. Casper Ruud advanced via retirement, …
author: Jonathan
